Translations.Text: Have you seen him who disbelieves in Our signs, and says, "I shall surely be given wealth and children
Has he become acquainted with the Unseen, or has he made a pact with the Beneficent
Not so! We will write down what he says, and We will extend for him a span of torment
And We will make him inherit that whereof he spoke, and he shall come to Us alone
They take other gods besides Allah to be their source of power
Not so! They shall deny their worship of them, and shall become their opponents
Do you not see that We have sent the devils against the disbelievers, to confound them with confusion
So be not you hasty with them. Verily, We do but number them a sum (of days)
On the Day when We will gather the righteous unto the Beneficent, honoured as a goodly company
We will drive the guilty into hell, like thirsty herds to water
They shall have no power of intercession, save him who has taken a covenant with his Lord
They say, "The Beneficent has taken to Himself a son
Assuredly, you have brought a monstrous thing
Whereby the heavens are almost torn asunder, and the earth is riven, and the mountains fall in ruin
That you attribute to the Beneficent a son
When it is not becoming to the majesty of the Beneficent that he take to Himself a son
There is none in the heavens or the earth but comes to the Beneficent as a servant
Verily, He knows them and numbers them exactly
And each one of them come unto Him on the Day of Resurrection, alone
